title: The Fonts of Summer! - Font Bros Update!
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222005/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 18.Aug.2008 3.52pm 

Warm Summer Greetings!

As we rush to cram in the last fun of Summer, we delight in some fresh new arrivals at Font Bros!

Pink Broccoli - Our friends at Pink Broccoli have been very busy creating some hip mod style 1960s typefaces you’re sure to dig! Check ’em out at: [http://www.fontbros.com/pink\_broccoli\_new.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222005/http:/www.fontbros.com/pink_broccoli_new.php "http://www.fontbros.com/pink\_broccoli\_new.php")

Harold’s Fonts - Harold has expanded his ever popular collection of rubber stamp style fonts with the Charter Family you’re sure to love! - Check ’em out at: [http://www.fontbros.com/harolds\_new.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222005/http:/www.fontbros.com/harolds_new.php "http://www.fontbros.com/harolds\_new.php")

Fontalicious - We continue to bring back even more great Fontalicious classic fonts updated in OpenType! - Check ’em out at: [http://www.fontbros.com/fontalicious\_new.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222005/http:/www.fontbros.com/fontalicious_new.php "http://www.fontbros.com/fontalicious\_new.php")

Plenty of great new additions this month and a load more on the way! Check ’em out and tell your pals!

[http://www.fontbros.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222005/http:/www.fontbros.com/ "http://www.fontbros.com")

Warmly,  
Mike & Stuart  
The Font Bros
author: paul d hunt
